channel.title: Blog on The dotBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on The dotBlog

item.title: Sop HÃ¤mting
item.description: Am Porter Bridges I was asked to remove cartons that were clogging up the entrance at work this morning. Looking at all of it I realized it would be somewhat of a logistical hardship to do in one go. Not that any of it was even remotely heavy but rather that the larger cartons contained so much junk that I would have to carry all of it in the boxes that contained the most stuff… and it was heavy-handed work as it turns out.

item.title: Waffles, Viruses, Porkchops and Decline
item.description: I had a bit of a stressful morning in all honesty. Maybe I didn’t catch enough sleep, not sure what it was, but I barely got to work on time. Things did settle quickly enough though, and that’s always good, there’s a special kind of peace that comes with sitting down and focusing on work for a good couple of hours. I mean, not every day can be like that of course, but today was a day like that.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
